'''''Mythlore'' 32''' ([https://dc.swosu.edu/mythlore/vol9/iss2/ Volume 9, Issue 2]) is an issue of the ''[[Mythlore]]'' journal, published by the [[Mythopoeic Society]].
==Contents==

====Articles====

* Davis, Howard. “The Ainulindale: Music of Creation.”
* Johnson, Janice. “The Celeblain of Celeborn and Galadriel.”
* GoodKnight, Glen H. “Tolkien in Translation.”
* Urrutia, Benjamin. “Some Notes to The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien.”
* Knapp, Bettina. “A Jungian Reading of the Kalevala 500–1300?: Finnish Shamanism—The Patriarchal Senex Figure. [Part 4: Conclusion].”

====Poetry====

*Purdy, Margaret R. “Dyad for Finrod.”

====Features====

* GoodKnight, Glen. Editorial.
* Some Readers' Thoughts.
* Christopher, Joe R. An Inkling's Bibliography (21).
* Speth, Lee. “Cavalier Treatment: Tolkien the Liberator.”
* Letters.

====Reviews====

* ''The Old English Exodus.'' Text, translation, and commentary by J.R.R; Tolkien. Edited by Joan Turville-Petre. Reviewed by Glen GoodKnight.
* ''J.R.R. Tolkien.'' Katharyn F. Crabbe. Reviewed by Nancy-Lou Patterson.
* ''England and Always: Tolkien's World of the Rings.'' Jared Lobdell. Reviewed by Nancy-Lou Patterson.
* ''The Tolkien Quiz Book.'' Nigel Robinson and Linda Wilson. Reviewed by E. Palmer Patterson II.
* ''Excalibur, Raiders of the Lost Ark, Clash of the Titans,'' and ''Dragonslayer''. Reviewed by Nicholas Grime.
